body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Accessibility             Accessibility          Reserved parking Curb cuts Ramped entrances         Wheelchair available for loan, no charge Picninc area accessible: paved path and accessible tables Paved paths Restrooms accessible         The self-guiding trail through the original mission grounds has signs that include audio information. This information can be heard after pushing a button.         Assistive listening receivers available for park movie.         The park movie is open captioned.         Large print text of the trailside recordings Large print text version of park brochure Large print text of park movie         A Braille version of the park brochure is available for use while at the site.
title: Whitman Mission National Historic Site: Accessibility
